a-cascader/changeOnSelect.description: change value on each selection if set to true, see above demo for details

a-cascader/displayRender.description: render function of displaying selected options, you can use slot="displayRender" and slot-scope="{labels, selectedOptions}"

a-cascader/expandTrigger.description: expand current item when click or hover, one of 'click' 'hover'

a-cascader/fieldNames.description: custom field name for label and value and children

a-cascader/getPopupContainer.description: Parent Node which the selector should be rendered to. Default to body. When position issues happen, try to modify it into scrollable content and position it relative.

a-cascader/loadData.description: To load option lazily, and it cannot work with showSearch

a-cascader/notFoundContent.description: Specify content to show when no result matches.

a-cascader/popupPlacement.description: use preset popup align config from builtinPlacementsï¼šbottomLeft bottomRight topLeft topRight

a-cascader/showSearch.description: Whether show search input in single mode.

a-cascader/size.description: input size, one of large default small
